name: Bubble Heat (Adrian Miasik)
description:
GBCJam Entry #1

A casual mobile arcade game created in roughly 12 hours. An obstacle course that takes place in mid-air, dodge the flying knives, and dodge the circling mosquitoes while you attempt to reach the air duct for safety!

Team members:
  • Adrian Miasik,
  • Jose Antonio Lee Cao,
  • James Jang
